Well, I hope you enjoyed picking up garbage. It's
truly nothing to be proud of. But I like someone who
will do the dirty jobs. I'm sending yout down to
the VIP area. You can make yourself useful there.
I suggest you visit Malcolm Exeter. He's one of my
suppliers. I imagine he could use someone like you.
But you might find other options as well.
You now have VIP status.
Oh, a nice package from Mr. Marbles?
You seem... useful. Would you like a job? Like one that
pays you?
I could use some cash.
No. Not really.
I could use some cash.
Very well then. My servants are all too lazy to keep
things tidy around here. If you'll just pick up the
garbage and dump it in the hole, Lili White will pay
you. You'll need this key to get to the back room.
Oh, and if you do a good job... I mean a complete job,
come back for a special reward. OK?
A
